View.Label: The new Ti.UI.iOS.MenuPopup API implements the iOS UIMenuController, also known as the editing menu since it usually displays commands like cut, copy paste etc.
See the controller for the implementation of the API's show(), isVisible() and hide() methods. The last two of these methods will be used after a timeout of 1 second.
The MenuPopup's 'click' event gets you the title and index of the selected item. You can see the full payload in the console.
